summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Suribet Retailer Management module. All 5 pages (Dashboard, Machines, Kasboek, Werknemers, Loonuitbetaling) are working correctly. Backend API tests: 29/29 passed. Frontend UI tests: All CRUD operations working.
critical_code_review_comments: All Suribet pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Sidebar navigation correctly shows SURIBET module with all 5 pages
All CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) work correctly for Machines, Werknemers, Kasboek
Loonbetaling correctly creates kasboek expense entry automatically
Dashboard stats correctly aggregate data from all collections
Exchange rates (wisselkoersen) can be viewed and updated
seed_data_creation: Test data created during testing: 1 machine (UI-TEST-001), 1 werknemer (Test Werknemer UI), kasboek entries
context_for_next_testing_agent: Suribet module fully tested. All 5 pages working: Dashboard (/app/suribet), Machines (/app/suribet/machines), Kasboek (/app/suribet/kasboek), Werknemers (/app/suribet/werknemers), Loonuitbetaling (/app/suribet/loonuitbetaling). Backend router at /app/backend/routers/suribet.py. Test file at /app/backend/tests/test_suribet_module.py with 29 tests covering all CRUD operations.

suribet_dashboard.details: Dashboard loads with stats (machines, omzet, commissie, werknemers, kasboek saldo), exchange rates display, quick action buttons work

suribet_machines.details: List machines, add new machine modal works, edit/delete via dropdown menu, status filter works

suribet_kasboek.details: List transactions, add income/expense entries, filter by type, month/year selector works

suribet_werknemers.details: List employees, add new employee with name/function/rates, edit/delete works

suribet_loonuitbetaling.details: List payments, add new payment modal with employee dropdown, period dates, amounts, auto-calculates net amount

sidebar_navigation.details: SURIBET module visible in sidebar with all 5 pages: Dashboard, Machines, Kasboek, Werknemers, Loonuitbetaling
